meanings: Verb 특히 英 (물을 많이 부어) 씻다[씻어 내다] (=rinse)
Intransitive verb 영·방언 타다, 그을리다, <초가> 녹다
Transitive verb 영·방언 태우다, 그을다, <초를> 녹이다
(휴식을 취하다) rest, relax, have[take] a rest, take a break, take time off, (informal) kick back
(일을) be out of work,, (휴가를 얻어서) take (a day) off, (일자리가 없어서) be unemployed, be in between jobs

examples.korean: He was momentarily winded by the blow to his stomach. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 복부를 맞아 순간적으로 숨을 쉴 수가 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: His breath smelt of garlic. 듣기 Add to Wordbook (숨을 쉴 때) 그의 입에서 마늘 냄새가 났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: We are very busy—so much so that we won’t be able to take time off this year. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 아주 바빠요. 너무 그래서[바빠서] 올해는 쉴 시간을 못 낼 것 같아요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We are very busy—so much so that we won’t be able to take time off this year. Add to Wordbook
